articles.title: Scientists Reveal What Earth's Magnetic Field Sounds Like - Global Times
articles.description: The scientists' work was made possible thanks to the data supplied by the European Space Agency's Swarm mission that was launched nearly a decade ago to study our planet's magnetic field.

articles.title: Severe Covid-19 patients at greater risk of post-infection symptoms: ECDC - Business Standard
articles.description: Individuals who are severely affected by Covid19 may be at higher risk of postinfection symptoms the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control ECDC said
articles.content:
Individuals who are severely affected by Covid-19 may be at higher risk of post-infection symptoms, the European Centre for Disease Prevention and Control (ECDC) said.
